This is to Inform you that Many people have invested In CryptoMining through this Mobile app name    Sharehash  
It Invests in many mining Cryptocurrencies namely Helium Ethereum and many others They assure a guaranteed return of  profit In the Beginning I Invested money and received the profit But after that invested  Contract of a Total RS  Principal with a profit of  still not received the Money

From th January  onward Sharehash app was not Working and even their Official website was not working we tried reaching out to them through email but we did not get any response from their side on social media Twitter we came to know that the company Sharehash is a fraud and Many people have lost their money by investing in this

So we hereby request you to kindly take up this issue at the earliest and do the needful

I have also attached the Contract and also the screenshot of the trend on Twitter about the Company

We have already made a complaint to the CPGram of the Department of Administrative Reforms vide Greviance Application number  DARPGE the application was disposed of as it was not pertaining to the Ministry of Corporate Affairs So I am now it representing before your kind authority 

I believe that Justice will be served and will be getting the principal amount

In November  I got an invitation through a WhatsApp group in which there were many Indian numbers as admins Screenshots attached The group claimed they were Cryptocurrency Consultants under the name of Peesions Investment Advisors LtdF Garden Road Central Western Hong Kong They shared contact details of an assistant to help me for trading The address is as th Finance Street Central Hong Kong We were asked to activate a wallet through a trading platform named Coin Global with headquarters in Singapore coingpluscom I also got my trading account activated with UID 
After  days trading the wallet balance increased to  million USDT when asked for withdrawal the company demanded the entire commission to be paid Being a huge amount I informed the inability and asked them to pay the balance But they cheated in the name of the withdrawal of  of total value after payment of  and late fee of  USD which was also paid 
The assistant stated that they need to bribe the police for getting the clearance  The amount of  USD was also paid to the wallet address provided by the assistant Even after this the assistant asked for more  USD to be paid to the Police
Please investigate and raise this to the appropriate level for getting my money I spent on the investment amounting to around Rs  crores besides arresting the members of the gang in India and abroad

An online company called KnC Chain surfaced actively in the later months of They took money from us in the name of buying machines through their app  returned back higher amounts than we invested after a certain period of timeMany investors paid money to various accounts in private banks via gpay and other online platformsThe company seemed be genuine as they kept updating on how the company has been progressing brightly and gained the trust of investorsThe company workers went by female names like Anna Devi and presented themselves as courteous women from foreign countries based in IndiaOn new year they put out many lucrative offers assuring much higher return than investedMe  thousands of innocent investors invested our hard earned money in the range of lakhs on the company
company workers stopped being polite and answering our messages after all our investments were doneIt was followed by stop in the arrival of money that we earlier used to get from our investments Then we also found out that the supposedly female workers were not females but Indian male using fake identity on whatsappOn consistent complaintthey provided us a notice that all transactions would continue from  January But On  they gave us another notice that demanded proof of our legitimacy in the company by asking us to deposit Rs  in their account else our account in the company will be dissolvedwhen we asked the necessity of the ultimatum and the verification no response came

After this I downloaded the app and invested an amount of Rs  via PAYTM I invested on an HNT mining machine that was provided on rent This app gave me a return of Rs  on th Jan  and I thought that it is a genuine app After this I invested another amount or Rs  on th Jan  and I came to know only after this that the withdrawal function was disabled The reason sighted by SHAREHASH team on their whatsapp group was that that they are upgrading the app and SHAREHASH  will go live from th or th Jan  So I thought it could be possible In the mean time I COVID positive and I was in home isolation from th Jan to th Jan  now when I am seeing this app has been removed completely and all the contact numbers through which SHAREHASH team used to communicate is switched off
Hence I am filing this complaint against this app SHAREHASH Please help me to get justice for against this fraud Many people have become fraud of this app recently

Platform Binance PP

Dear Sir
I had placed an order to convert  USDT into Indian Rupees  Lakh on Binance PP 

One of the Binance User AdityaPP took an order to buy  USDT for Rs Lakh at around am today 

He started messaging Binance PP that he has done the payment and I have not transferred the amount to him Usually I receive payment notification of an impending deal but I did NOT received any message on my phone this time No message that some a transaction is going on 

By pm he convinced customer care that he had transferred one lakh into my account but no such amount was transferred As result I couldnt present my side of proof that I received no such amount no amount was credited to me I became aware of this horrifying accident when I was checking my email that see  USDT was transferred at  pm

I immediately chatted with customer care to freeze his account and they have frozen it I have been told he has transferred some part of this amount  USDT to some other crypto address

I am attaching my ICICI bank account statement for proof that I did not receive any such amount

Sir it is my humble request that you contact Binance to find and take legal action against this fraud

Please take strong legal action against the fraudster sir

crimeaditionalinfo:
The cryptocurrency website wwwpinksalefinance as per our findings has decieved many investors and many project owners by knowingly exposing sensitve information of clients to the prevailing darknets and cyber criminals they are partnered with  Their modus operandi is when someone registers as a client in their website they expose their ids to darknet and results in exposing the person to countless spam dangeroud ids 

In our case we tried to do a launchpad presale with a honest attempt and we set a funraisal of BNb which  it was a fully dveloped project with A neo Bank solution and a Decentralised exchange platform momenets after launch we were exposed to phising links and our whole project was compromised due to their bhaviour  Further before organising the presale on the name of kyc our partners were asked to self declare exposure to intepol and other internation police without having our rights  also our IDs has been compromised and we fear putting our ids to misuse as well as our wallet ids  We seek a immediate compensation of BNB due to cyber harrasment and bully and playing with investor sentiments and money  Many other complaints can be tracked from google and other social channels and it seems they are a habitual offender An entire full screen video of day  to today has been recorded with the agents 

We seek an immediate ban on the website www pinksalefinance in India  Singapore and US and also seek compensation of mental harrasment

crimeaditionalinfo: Fake facebook advertisements quoting Azim Premji and Mukesh Ambani soliciting people to invest in a new cryptocurrency autotrading program called Bitcoin Loophole Clicking on the link took me to the website of Tredexo for registration  Tredexo seems to be an unregulated offshore online forex trading broker owned by ABAX Inc of the UK with Headquarter locations being Saint Vincent and the Grenadines I first paid  Euros for registration Money started growing rapidly Then they enticed me to join their limited period program requiring higher investment for  days I paid INR  lakhs for it On nd Dec when I asked for my money back I was handed over a letter mentioning that I have earned a profit of Euro  from the trading done by Tredexo on my behalf and a commission of Euro  was payable by me as their services They refused to adjust the commission from my profits claiming the transaction with the full amount had already been initiated on Blockchain and will be paid into my bank account once I pay the commission separately This letter was QR coded and by clicking on the QR code an online transaction record on blockchain was visible I paid the commission then they started asking for Insurance amount of Euros  around Dec   purportedly to protect my transaction from losses due to hacking Once paid they started asking for conversion charges INR  lakh plus When I refused to pay it they have stopped communicating
